lesson1.question: Eu como carne bovina no almoço
Eu como pão no café da manhã

lesson1.answer: i don't drink a glass of water

lesson1.answer: do you eat fish for dinner?

lesson1.answer: i don't drink a cup of coffee

lesson1.answer: do you drink tea for breakfast?

lesson1.question: Eu não bebo um copo de suco
lesson1.answer: i don't drink a glass of juice

lesson2.question: Eu falo inglês com minha mãe
lesson2.answer: i speak english with my mother

lesson2.answer: do you speak spanish with your cousin?

lesson2.answer: i study spanish with my sister

lesson2.answer: do you study french with your father?

lesson3.answer: i need to speak with my son

lesson3.answer: do you want to study with your nephew?

lesson3.answer: i want to study german this year

lesson3.answer: i need to study with you next week

lesson3.answer: i don't want to drink coffee for breakfast

lesson3.answer: i don't want to study with my niece

lesson4.answer: i don't want to study chinese with my brother

lesson5.answer: they go to the mall in the morning
